long_description: The Marmot Stride vest suits those in-between days when running with a jacket is too warm but it's too cold to go without an outer layer; a vest provides optimal breathability and coverage. Tightly woven polyester fabric is wind-resistant and a Durable Water Repellent finish helps repel water, all while remaining comfortably breathable. Dri-Clime(R) bi-component lining wicks moisture away from skin, keeping you dry during aerobic activity; underarm mesh venting enhances breathability. Drawcords at collar and hem allow you to seal in warmth. 2 zippered hand pockets provide secure storage; 1 zippered chest pocket with headphone port easily carries a media player. The Marmot Stride vest is highly reflective, increasing visibility in dim light.
short_description: The Marmot Stride vest suits those in-between days when running with a jacket is too warm but it's too cold to go without an outer layer; a vest provides optimal breathability and coverage.
